title: AI Workflow: Voice-to-Activity Logging
summary: Empowered sales reps to quickly log customer meetings by speaking into their phones—no typing, no lag, just smart, seamless activity capture.
overview: I designed a voice-to-text workflow that helps sales reps log customer activities in real time using just their mobile devices. The feature uses AI-powered speech recognition to transcribe natural language into structured data, automatically syncing with backend systems via API. This eliminated the need for tedious manual entry, making it faster and easier for reps to capture important context while it's still fresh—whether walking out of a meeting or driving to the next one. The UX focused on simplicity, speed, and accessibility to ensure it supported real-world sales behavior without adding friction.
impact:
• Reduced average activity logging time by 60%
  • Increased activity logging completeness by 35%
  • Boosted adoption across field teams by making the tool feel like a natural extension of their workflow
problem: Sales reps were consistently falling behind on logging activities. Manual input on mobile devices was time-consuming and often delayed, leading to incomplete records, lost context, and gaps in reporting.
solution:
• Integrated voice-to-text functionality using AI speech recognition
  • Designed a mobile-first UX with minimal tap-to-record interactions
  • Parsed natural speech into structured CRM-ready fields via API
  • Built feedback loops to confirm and correct transcription errors quickly
